tooltip_reset_extra: It will reset just extra-time. The main time of the last interval is already saved in statistics.
tooltip_add_extra: It will add an extra-time to the last interval in statistics.
tooltip_reset: It will reset timer, without adding anything in statistics.
tooltip_add: It will add passed time into statistics (rounded to minutes).
click_for_details: Click for show/hide details for a day

settings.title: settings
settings.colorful_favicon: Show last time seconds in the favicon in color
settings.basic_factor: Basic factor is calculated by your intervals, using basic pomodoro rule that after 4-th pomodoro yo take long break.
settings.formula_factor_sentence: The formula for counting activity factor is
settings.formula_factor_variables: a - activity time, b - short break, lb - long break
settings.change_notifications_permission: You need to make changes in you browser settings for activating notifications
settings.title_interval: Title which should shows instead of duration
settings.reset_warning: After each reset action the page will reload
settings.show_current_activity_main_screen: Current activity in top right corner

sounds.saucer: Putting a cup on a saucer

notifications.test_body: There is body of test notification
notifications.warning: If you don't see the test notification – check your browser or/and system settings – they need to allow them for this site and browser at all

validation.deprecated_activity: This activity is removed. You can keep it like that or choose the existed one
validation.duration_intersect: That duration make this record intersect with the next one
validation.duration_next_day: There is no possibility to set end time in next day
validation.duration_more_than_current: You couldn't set time more than current time
validation.activity_more_than: The activity couldn't be saved with the duration more than 24 hours. It is reduced to 24 hours and saved.
validation.intersect_error: The period with entered time intersect existed records
validation.duration_negative_error: End time has to be after start time

tooltips.period_description: You can hide this descriptions in Settings -> Main screen -> Descriptions near periods
